点击减少10的竞选资金。SHIFT-点击减少100。CTRL-点击完全移除资金。

我注意到[From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledName]已通过贿赂与威胁在我的领域内打通了[From.GetHerHis]门路，意图获得足够的人数去承认[From.GetSheHe]为[From.GetHerHis]领主[From.Liege.GetTitledName]伪造的我头衔的宣称权。

被扔进黑牢。
来自这片区域内各个地方的商人建立了一座小商栈以进行贸易。
[k_france.GetName]更名为法兰西。
[k_germany.GetName]更名为德意志。
你的家庭近亲或许会跟随你改宗。
我的导师

终于，[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]完成[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]找寻强力宝物的任务回到家乡。手持一件古老的木箱，你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]出现在你面前，鞠躬将其献上。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我找遍辽远之地，为你寻获约柜的本体！」

这件令人好奇的箱子上装饰着黄金铸就的天使军队和远古的象形文字。

根据传说，其内安放着记述十诫的原初石板，由雅威于西奈山上赐予摩西。

[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在你面前耐心地等待，似乎盼望着你发话。
约柜

欢迎宴会结束，[From.GetDynName][From.GetJobTitle]与我退避至私密处继续谈话，在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding]的高墙后赏月。突然，数道亮光划过天空，[From.GetJobTitle]的面容变得苍白。「恶兆，」[From.GetSheHe]嘟囔道，匆匆离开。
我与宾客[From.GetDynName][From.GetJobTitle]在园林中散步，我评论了几句艳阳天。思虑之后，[From.GetDynName]热切地应和我。看起来[From.GetSheHe]认为我的寒暄是暗喻天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的开明本性！

一口沉重的箱子呈上我面前。[From.GetFirstName]结束了[From.GetHerHis]工作，君权珍宝已完成。我兴奋地想要看看[From.GetFirstName]的手工技术。
一口沉重的箱子呈上我面前。[From.GetFirstName]结束了[From.GetHerHis]工作，君权珍宝已完成。我期待真正符合我[Root.GetPrimaryTitles]头衔地位的东西，我也兴奋地想要看看[From.GetFirstName]的手工技术。

「[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]，我明白了。很好的选择，我的[Root.GetTitle]」[From.GetFirstName][From.GetMasterMistressCap]说道，叫来一名助手，[From.GetHerHis]怀中抱着数件[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。「我这里有好几件样品。一个人必须确定自己需要什么，愿意付出多少，不过它们都将出色地服务于你的高贵地位。」
[From.GetFirstName][From.GetMasterMistressCap]的首要助手将完成的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]呈现给我。武器的设计优雅而简洁，看来我可以带着这件优质武器上战场。
[From.GetFirstName][From.GetMasterMistressCap]的首要助手将完成的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]呈现给我，我是期待已久了。这是件美丽而优雅的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]，我很兴奋地看到其超出我原有的期望。
「好消息，我的[Root.GetTitle]，」[From.GetFirstName]兴奋地说道。[GetWeaponArmorSmith]告知我珍贵金属和特殊工具就位于一处临近省份。如果我们派出一支探险队，可能增加我们当前正在制作的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]的品质。

[From.GetFirstName][From.GetMasterMistressCap]宣布[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]即将完工，我被神经质般的兴奋情绪占据。今天我在宝座室接见[From.GetMasterMistressCap]。[From.GetHerHis]双臂中有一个结实的箱子，[From.GetSheHe]打开箱盖，我发觉自己几乎无法呼吸。「你要给她取什么名字，我的[Root.GetTitle]？」
[From.GetFirstName][From.GetMasterMistressCap]宣布[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]即将完工，我被神经质般的兴奋情绪占据。今天我在宝座室接见[From.GetMasterMistressCap]。[From.GetSheHe]显露出放置盔甲的架子，我发觉自己几乎无法呼吸。「你要给她取什么名字，我的[Root.GetTitle]？」

传说中的利刃，据说能撕裂龙的血肉。
传说中的利刃，据说是天怒的具象。
传说中的利刃，据说是用[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的怒火锻造的。
传说中的弯刀，以黄金打造。
传说中的弯刀，谣传其中充满了暗夜里死去的所有亡灵。
传说中的弯刀，谣传是死亡的化身。
据说是由传说中圣乔治之枪重新打造。

传说中的长枪，谣传能刺穿最坚固的物质。
传说中的斧头，据说曾劈开无数的巨龙。
传说中的斧头，谣传曾由[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的使者挥舞。
传说中的斧头，谣传注入了黑夜的精华。

传说中的弓，据说注入了死者的灵魂。
传说中的弓，据说在暴风的中心打造，并注入了其内的精华。
传说中的弓，据说以神话之鹰的骨头打造。
传说中的盔甲，谣传是供天使穿戴的。
传说中的盔甲，据说是亚瑟王的绿骑士所穿。
传说中的盔甲，据说凡人的任何手段皆无法损伤。

I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [From.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [From.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...

'Good news, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said excitedly. The goldsmith has informed me that precious metals and gemstones have been located in a nearby province. If we send an expedition, it could increase the quality of the crown jewels we are currently crafting.

The pillaging and looting undertaken in your name has earned you a reputation as a fearsome Viking raider. All along the coasts, mothers tucking their children in for the night warn that unless they behave, the terrible [Root.GetFirstName], scourge of the seas, will come ashore with [Root.GetHerHis] undead warriors and eat them.

You are known as [GetFirstName] the [GetSeaQueenKing], for you can take whatever you want anywhere that the wild waves beat on rock or sand. No [Root.GetManWoman] sails a ship better, no [Root.GetManWoman] fights more fiercely, no [Root.GetManWoman] is held in more fear.

§Y*§! Crown Laws can only be passed by Kings and Emperors.\n§Y*§! They concern everyone in the DeJure Kingdom or Empire.\n§Y*§! If a DeJure Kingdom or Empire does not exist, the DeFacto Kingdom or Empire Crown Laws will take precedence.

Despite their similarities, the Indian religions also have their distinct differences. Jain rulers build the most stable realms, but are the least aggressive and have no Holy Wars. Hinduism is the most warlike of them, but have a caste system which restricts their status and relationships. Finally, the Buddhist faith gives a large bonus to technological advancement.

On succession, Weak Claims are given to children who are not second or third in the line of succession. Weak Claims can only be pressed against:
§Y* Female Rulers 
  * Current title holder doesn't have Full Status for women
  * The claimant is male, or either gender if the claimant have Full Status for women
* Regencies
* Titles already being contested in a Claim or Succession War
* Titles the claimant is second or third in line to inherit§!

You may give the order to permanently blind §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!. This is a common Byzantine way of dealing with political rivals without outright killing them.
You may give the order to castrate §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! and turn him into a eunuch. He will be unable to sire more spawn or hold landed titles, a severe punishment.

[offmap_china.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] must be displeased with the Dragon Throne, for a great Mongol Horde has managed to cross the mighty fortifications of Northern China, intent on disrupting the harmony and prosperity of the 'Divine Land'. [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetDynName] is mustering [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] armies in [GetRandomChineseRegion] for a swift response, but [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] could be in for a long war...\n\nFor tributary states of China this means that their suzerain will be unable to lend them military aid. Others point out that it is an opportune time to break free.

[FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] must have decided to punish the arrogance of the bureaucratic Chinese regime, for a great Jurchen Horde has recently disrupted the harmony of the 'Divine Land'. Led by their great Khagan, numberless fierce riders have crossed the Liao river and invaded Northeastern China, apparently intent on conquering the whole empire. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] is slowly gathering [FromFrom.Ruler.GetPossPronoun] forces in [GetRandomChineseRegion], but many are already questioning whether [FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] has lost the Mandate of Heaven...\n\nFor tributary states of China this means that their suzerain will be unable to lend them military aid. Others point out that it is an opportune time to break free.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] gets 'Angered China' for 50 years, decreasing Monthly Prestige by §R-0.50§! and Monthly Grace by §R-2§!.
But I am not ready to commit to a pastime so whole-heartedly...

Tribes are settled, but agrarian. Each County can only have one Tribal 'Holding', representing the entire local tribal population - the more empty Holding slots, the more powerful the Tribal Holding. Tribal rulers are most often seen using the 'Elective Gavelkind' Succession Law, which tends to fragment the realm between sons on the death of the chief.
Well done, [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle] [corresponding_councilor.GetFirstName].
My guests have arrived for the private feast I have arranged. It's time to let the carousing and merriment begin!
I have arrived at the private rooms of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. There is plenty of food and drink here, and the mood is decidedly merry. I am looking forward to this!

Late into the third day of feasting, I sit awake, alone, contemplating the revelries. Next to me on a couch lies one of my companions, sleeping a deep drunken sleep, defenseless and beautiful, skin glowing in the candlelight.

Several days of feasting together, and I have many times caught [From.GetFirstName] looking at me in that 'special' way. Finally, after a late cup of wine, [From.GetSheHe] puts [From.GetHerHis] arms around me and whispers a delicious proposal in my ear...
[From.GetFirstName] acceded to my advances, and we spend the rest of the night together, enjoying each other...
[From.GetFirstName] declined my amorous advances. I excuse myself, then return to the pleasures of the table. Soon, the embarrassing moment is forgotten... almost.
These days of revelry are an excellent escape. So many laughs and so many intense conversations in such short a time... It brings me closer to my companions, I feel like good friends already.
Is it the drink? Is it something someone said? I don't remember, honestly, but someone has to pay! Fight!

Good drinks and food, carousing, everything is fine. Or was fine, until [From.GetTitledFirstName] unexpectedly threw a fit of rage. I'm not sure why, but [From.GetSheHe]'s coming at me right now with [From.GetHerHis] fists up.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] put up a good fight, in spite of being just as inebriated as I. After a while we were both exhausted and had to call it a draw.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] started speaking to me calmly, explaining that there was no need to be upset. I considered it for a moment, and then realized that [From.GetSheHe] was right. We ended up sitting down to eat and drink together again.
At the last moment, [From.GetSheHe] ran out, after throwing a chair at me and making me stumble. I searched everywhere but couldn't find [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is feasting and reveling like a lunatic. I can hardly stand up, I am laughing so hard.
It's great to spend time carousing and frolicking in good company. I feel great, absolutely great, and that means the time has come to bring out the old game board.

It's great to spend time carousing in merry company. While the cups are being refilled, [From.GetTitledFirstName] brings out a strange board with little decorated pieces, explaining that it's a kind of strategy game. [From.GetSheHeCap] assures me that it's a great pastime that combines well with copious amounts of drink.
I suggested to [From.GetTitledFirstName] that we bring out the board and pieces to play and see who is the better strategist. [From.GetSheHeCap] has accepted, on the condition that we play for money.
I suggested to [From.GetTitledFirstName] that we bring out the board and pieces to play and see who's the better strategist. [From.GetSheHeCap] accepted, insisting that we play for honor.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought out the board and pieces and suggests that we play a few rounds to determine who is the better strategist. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that we play for money.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought out the board and pieces and suggests that we play a few rounds to determine who is the better strategist. We will play for honor.

We played for hours, the tides of fortune ebbing and flowing as I tried to attack my opponent's positions without opening my defense too much. Eventually, I found a critical opening, made a few inspired and aggressive moves and won the game!

We played for hours, the tides of fortune ebbing and flowing as I tried to attack my opponent's positions without opening my defense too much. Eventually, however, I made a fatal mistake that my opponent exploited, and I lost the game.

Privacy Policy
The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.
This scepter is famed for the unusual amount and quality of emeralds adorning it. The origins of the stones are shrouded in mysteries, the tales are as numerous as the stars.
This ornamental weapon is an impressive sight. The blade is gilded and the hilt is adorned with foreign precious stones, such as rubies and sapphires, and agate cameos depicting legendary warriors.
This dagger, with its gilded blade and heavily adorned hilt, radiates power. Gleaming rubies, garnets and diamonds are placed in swirling patterns along the hilt.
These golden bracelets are decorated with rubies and engraved pieces of ivory.
With its dozens upon dozens of diamonds and sapphires, this necklace is as beautiful as the night sky itself. Its centerpiece is a marvelous, walnut-sized blue diamond.
This majestic circlet is adorned with golden wings and uncommonly big and lustrous sapphires.
This heavy gilded staff is engraved with scenes from ancient tales and adorned with both emeralds and ivory.
This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
The base of the crown is a heavy golden band, and each peak is shaped and engraved in the likeness of legendary warriors. The centerpiece is a single, gleaming ruby.
This gilded axe is engraved with pictures from the ancestral legends. Ambers are set in the handle.
